GSP29gaunys_u:9: 1.1.4: indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam jñānam avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāyātmakam pratyakṣam
GSP29gaunys_u:11: 1.1.5: atha tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānaṃ pūrvavat śeṣavat sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ ca
GSP29gaunys_u:28: 1.1.13: pṛthivī āpaḥ tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśam iti bhūtāni
GSP29gaunys_u:49: 1.1.23: samānānekadharmopapatteḥ vipratipatteḥ upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthātaḥ ca viśeṣāpekṣaḥ vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:51: 1.1.24: yam artham adhikṛtya pravartate tat prayojanam
GSP29gaunys_u:53: 1.1.25: laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasmin arthe buddhisāmyam saḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:81: 1.1.38: udāharaṇāpekṣaḥ tathā iti upasaṃhāraḥ na tathā iti vā sādhyasya upanayaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:86: 1.1.40: avijñātatatve arthe kāraṇopapattitaḥ tattvajñānārtham uhaḥ tarkaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:115: 1.2.11: tat trividham - vākchalam sāmānyacchalam upacāracchalam ca iti
GSP29gaunys_u:117: 1.2.12: aviśeṣābhihite arthe vaktuḥ abhiprāyāt arthāntarakalpanā vākchalam
GSP29gaunys_u:151: 2.1.6: yathoktādhyavasāyāt eva tadviśeṣāpekṣāt saṃśaye na asaṃśayaḥ na atyantasaṃśayaḥ vā
GSP29gaunys_u:158: 2.1.9: pūrvaṃ hi pramāṇasiddhau na indriyārthasannikarṣāt pratyakṣotpattiḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:180: 2.1.20: kvacit nivṛttidarśanāt anivṛttidarśanāt ca kvacit anekāntaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:192: 2.1.26: pratyakṣanimittatvāt ca indriyārthayoḥ sannikarṣasya svaśabdena vacanam
GSP29gaunys_u:205: 2.1.32: na, pratyakṣeṇa yāvat tāvat api upalambhāt
GSP29gaunys_u:216: 2.1.37: senāvanavat grahaṇam iti cet na atīndriyatvāt aṇūnām
GSP29gaunys_u:243: 2.1.48: na apratyakṣe gavaye pramāṇārtham upamānasya paśyāmaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:245: 2.1.49: tathā iti upasaṃhārāt upamānasiddheḥ na aviśeṣaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:279: 2.1.65: stutiḥ nindā parakṛtiḥ purākalpaḥ iti arthavādaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:298: 2.2.2: śabde aitihyānarthāntarabhāvāt anumāne arthāpattisambhavābhāvānarthāntara bhāvāt ca apratiṣedhaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:312: 2.2.9: asati arthe na abhāvaḥ iti cet na,
GSP29gaunys_u:323: 2.2.14: na, ghaṭābhāvasāmānyanityatvāt nityeṣu api anityavat upacārāt ca
GSP29gaunys_u:360: 2.2.31: anyat anyasmāt ananyatvāt ananyat iti anyatābhāvaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:385: 2.2.43: dvividhasya api hetoḥ abhāvāt asādhanaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:405: 2.2.53: nityānām atīndriyatvāt taddharmavikalpāt ca varṇavikārāṇām apratiṣedhaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:409: 2.2.55: vikāradharmitve nityatvābhāvāt kālāntare vikāropapatteḥ ca apratiṣedhaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:435: 2.2.66: vyaktyākṛtiyukte api aprasaṅgāt prokṣaṇādināṃ mṛdgavake jātiḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:517: 3.1.32: kṛṣṇasāre sati upalambhāt vyatiricya ca upalambhāt saṃśayaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:579: 3.1.63: ap-tejo-vāyūnāṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvam apohya ākāśasya uttaraḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:621: 3.2.10: sphaṭike api aparāparotpatteḥ kṣaṇikatvāt vyaktīnām ahetuḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:635: 3.2.17: kvacit vināśakāraṇānupalabdheḥ kvacit ca upalabdheḥ anekāntaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:652: 3.2.25: jñānasamavetātmapradeśasannikarṣāt manasaḥ smṛtyutpatteḥ na yugapat utpattiḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:678: 3.2.38: yathoktahetutvāt pāratantryāt akṛtābhyāgamāt ca na manasaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:740: 3.2.68: tat adṛṣṭakāritam iti cet punaḥ tatprasaṅgaḥ apavarge
GSP29gaunys_u:957: 4.2.26: buddhyā vivecanāttu bhāvānāṃ yāthātmyānupalabdhistantvapakarṣaṇe paṭasadbhāvānupalabdhivat tadanupalabdhiḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:1026: 5.1.7: prāpya sādhyamaprāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyāviśiṣṭatvādaprāptyāsādhāka tvācca prāptyaprāptisamau
GSP29gaunys_u:1042: 5.1.15: sādharmyātsaṃśaye na saṃśayo vaidharmyādubhayathā vā saṃśaye 'tyanta saṃśayaprasaṅgo nityatvānabhyūpagamācca sāmānyasyāpratiṣedhaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:1081: 5.1.34: dṛṣṭānte ca sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya tasysa cobhayathā bhāvānnāviśeṣaḥ
GSP29gaunys_u:1097: 5.1.42: pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣamabhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā
GSP29gaunys_u:1099: 5.1.43: svapakṣalakṣanāpekṣopapattyupasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe parapakṣadoṣā bhyupagamāt samāno doṣa iti
GSP29gaunys_u:1104: arthāntaraṃ nirarthakam avijñātārtham apārthakam aprāpta kālaṃ nyūnam adhikaṃ punaruktam
GSP29gaunys_u:1105: ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepo matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇaṃ niranuyojyānuyogo
GSP29gaunys_u:1138: 5.2.17: vijñātasya pariṣadā triḥ abhihitasya api apratyuccāraṇam ananubhāṣaṇam
